phrases: You are the one who gives me my future
Even on a road without signs, I will be fine, if we are together
On a journey that I cannot see ahead of, while I was lost, I found it
That my place to be is next to you
When we quarrelled, I let go of your hand again and again
I want to pull close and hold it now
You are the one who gives me my future
If I am beaten down by the rain of tears
I want to hold you, call my name immediately
I will accept sadness and bluffing in my hands
I suddenly turned my back on you and ran away
Because you have been so gentle to many other girls
Because it will not be over after this
I cannot say I am sorry, sorry
Even though I believe you, my lips are pouting
Catch me in the town where a drizzle is falling
Because I will turn around and give you a make-up kiss
You had a relationship like that?!
Jella isa undzu hagal beoque il!
Have you been up all this time?
I wish I could read the words.
Friends are supposed to help each other.
It is the name of the hero.
The name of the girl who was saved.
My mother used to read it to me when I was young.
What should I do if I cannot use it ever again?
I bet you are just tired.
Get some rest and I am sure it will come back.
Do not say such an irresponsible thing!
I do not feel anything in me!
If you cannot use magic, I will protect him.
So this time, I will protect Saito.
It is what I want to do for him.
What is the ruckus so late at night?
This puppet really is like a devilish monster.
I like it, my beloved Myoz.
What is Charlotte and her party doing?
They passed through the forest of Alden and are approaching the border.
The wind that blows through the Carillon Canyon shall cry at your death!
Daughter of my brother, Charles, who left her behind.
If I see you lie bleeding on the ground, will my heart cry out in pain?
Similar to when I killed Charles?
I do not see anything in the distance.
Continue to keep your eyes open.
I received a notice saying there is something suspicious going on at San Maron, near the border of Gallia.
The King of Gallia would not just let them go.
However, invading through another's border is...
It is time to make use of the Great Spear.
I am sure this too came originally from the eastern land.
It is one of the artefacts we cannot tie to anything else.
I will save them even at the cost of my own life.
What do you intend to do with just the four of you?
If you are going to load that on the Ostland,
I will lend you the Musketeer Force's strength.
I just hope we do not have to use it.
Having slain the dragon, Ivaldi made his way deeper into the c... c -
I am starting to be able to read a lot.
When you are teaching me, I can pick up reading really fast.
It is part of Gandalfr's power.
I heard you will change, body and soul,
when you are completely overtaken by Gandalfr's power.
You become a different person when you become Gandalfr?
So Saito's with me because he is Gandalfr?
So once I am no longer a Void mage, it is over between us?
If I cannot use my magic anymore,
then someone else will become the Void mage and...
What did it feel like when you got out of your Gandalfr state?
You should have felt a change in your heart!
So why did you form a contract with me again?!
You are the one that summoned me.
Do not call me an idiot!
Once we are over the bridge, we are in Tristain.
You have got to be kidding me...
You did not think you would be able to get away that easily, did you?
Find an opportunity to cross the bridge.
I am glad to see you are safe.
You are very brave to fight against this Jormungand.
Sorry, but are not here for you.
In that case, allow us to entertain you.
Is not it about time for the trump card to come out?
If you do not understand what I am talking about...
Looks like it is not working after all.
Show me the true power of a Void mage!
She does not know yet that I cannot use magic.
Let go of me, you coward!
You have no right to order me around!
Looks like you do not know your place.
I already told you it is useless!
So this time, I will protect Saito.
I am the one you want, right?!
I do not have time to babysit you!
Why did you come save me?
You ruined my plan to buy time.
Why do not you get it?
I am back to being the Zero Louise.
I am not worth being protected.
Hey, you were not thinking about sacrificing yourself, were you?
Turn the handle and set the bearing!
Gimli and Malicorn, prepare the she will!
It has Counter on its armour.
Cast Dispel on the she will.
That is the only way to pierce it.
You are Gandalfr, and you are with me only because I am a void mage.
What is the contract good for?
When the master cannot use magic, the bond is practically gone!
It is not the time for that!
Just say what is on your mind!
Or cannot Gandalfr say what is he is really thinking?!
I will protect you with everything I have.
Why are you thinking all this by yourself?
All this master and familiar crap.
I have been telling you that I love you from long ago.
You are a really pitiful dog.
You are so scared of getting yelled at by your favourite master, are not you?
Speaking of you, you cannot control the fact you love me so much, can you?
I am just conditioned to love my familiar.
I knew you were all jealous and all!
I pity myself for how I developed feelings for my familiar,
getting controlled by the power of the Void.
So... I am doing this against my will.
We are all ready to accept any kind of punishment.
I will now give you your punishment for trespassing into Gallia.
Second in line for the throne.
As a Void mage, work hard for Tristain.
I will return to you the mantle of a chevalier.
Do not let go of it again.
